item.description:
The Bicycle Coalition of Maine (BCM) will hold its spring fundraiser at Flatbread Pizza Co., 72 Commercial St., Portland on May 19 from 5 to 9 p.m. This popular event includes the unbeatable combination of pizza, beer and bicyclists. You can catch up with friends who have been hibernating all winter and perhaps even find some new biking partners.

Flatbread will donate a portion of the proceeds from every pizza sold during the evening (including takeout orders) to BCM, and Shipyard Brewing Co. will donate $1 for every beer sold. Proceeds will support BCM's safety and education programs.

For more information, please visit www.BikeMaine.org or call (207) 623-4511.

So eat pizza and drink beer (or soda) at Flatbread with other Meetup members, to benefit the Bicycle Coalition of Maine! Free bike stickers and Bicycling Street Smarts booklets will be available to Bicycle Meetup members.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the table with the Meetup sign
item.name: Flatbread Pizza BCM Fundraiser
